text: Vladimir Nikolayevich Solovyov (Russian: Владимир Николаевич Соловьёв; born 21 November 1946) is a Soviet rower from Russia. He competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich with the men's coxed four where they came fourth. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Saint Petersburg
title: Vladimir Solovyov (rower)
